title: official source code repo link is not working
official source code repo link is not working

text:
> In README.rst, these links appear broken.

Indeed. Thanks for letting us know. I fixed them.

> I assume you need the source code to install? Any plans for pip
> install?

Later. Right now this is completely bleeding edge, and you shouldn't be
using it if you don't know how to rid a wild bronco of a code. Seriously:
no backward compatibility whatsoever will be guaranteed.
